oralHygiene.title: Oral Hygiene Guide
oralHygiene.subtitle: Learn the essential steps for maintaining optimal dental health

brushing.title: Proper Brushing Technique
brushing.description: Effective brushing is key to preventing cavities and maintaining healthy gums.
tips: Brush at least twice a day for two minutes each time
Use fluoride toothpaste and a soft-bristled brush
Don't forget to brush your tongue

flossing.title: Flossing Essentials
flossing.description: Daily flossing removes plaque and food particles between teeth where your toothbrush can't reach.
tips: Curve the floss around each tooth
Use clean sections of floss for each tooth
Be gentle to avoid damaging your gums

checkups.title: Regular Dental Check-ups
checkups.description: Professional cleanings and check-ups every 6 months help maintain your oral health and catch problems early.

procedures.title: Common Dental Procedures
procedures.subtitle: Understanding what to expect during your dental treatment

cleaning.title: Professional Teeth Cleaning
cleaning.description: Regular professional cleaning is essential for maintaining oral health and preventing gum disease.
points: Includes thorough examination of teeth and gums
Helps prevent cavities and gum disease

fillings.title: Dental Fillings
fillings.description: Fillings restore damaged teeth and prevent further decay.
points: Can last many years with proper care

rootCanal.title: Root Canal Treatment
rootCanal.description: Root canal therapy saves severely damaged or infected teeth.
points: High success rate for saving teeth

crowns.title: Dental Crowns
crowns.description: Crowns protect and restore damaged or weakened teeth.

implants.title: Dental Implants
implants.subtitle: A permanent solution for missing teeth with natural-looking results

what.title: What Are Dental Implants?
what.description: Dental implants are titanium posts that serve as artificial tooth roots, providing a permanent base for fixed replacement teeth.
points: Titanium post acts as an artificial root
Provides stable support for artificial teeth
Can last a lifetime with proper care
Looks and functions like natural teeth

benefits.title: Benefits of Dental Implants
benefits.description: Implants offer numerous advantages over traditional tooth replacement options.
points: Prevents bone loss and maintains facial structure
No impact on surrounding healthy teeth
Eat your favorite foods without restrictions
Boost in confidence with a natural-looking smile

procedure.title: The Implant Procedure
procedure.description: The dental implant process is completed in several stages to ensure optimal results.
steps: Placement of the final crown or prosthetic

candidacy.title: Are You a Candidate?
candidacy.description: Most people with good oral health are eligible for dental implants.
points: Adequate bone density in the jaw
Healthy gums free of periodontal disease
Non-smoker or willing to quit during treatment

allOnX.title: All-on-X Dental Solutions
allOnX.subtitle: Complete arch restoration with advanced implant technology

overview.title: Understanding All-on-X
overview.description: All-on-X is an innovative full-arch restoration that provides a permanent solution for multiple missing teeth using strategically placed dental implants.

types.title: Types of All-on-X Solutions
types.description: Different options are available based on your specific needs and bone structure.
solutions: All-on-4: Uses 4 implants for full arch restoration
All-on-8: Maximum support for complex cases

benefits.title: Advantages of All-on-X
benefits.description: All-on-X offers numerous benefits over traditional tooth replacement methods.
points: Restored ability to eat and speak normally

process.title: Treatment Process
process.description: The All-on-X procedure is completed in several carefully planned stages.
